title: House in Bellanthota
details:
LAND DETAILS

Luxury is… so much more than location. Prime lands launches its new luxury housing project at bellanwila
Offers 12 modern architecturally designed homes with modern luxuries and located in a peaceful vicinity, 300 m to bellanwila junction , close to raja maha viharaya
2 storeyed houses are from rs. 27 million upwards, promises luxury at an affordable price and offer perfect value for money
The project conveniently close to the best of everything.
To closest towns of pepiliyana , dehiwala, nugegoda, maharagama, boralesgamuwa
These homes are built on 6 to 8 perch blocks by efficiently using the space to give you the maximum output
